languages.text: "Одобряю вашу способность взирать в лицо фактам без страха и предубеждений, Ваша Светлость. Вы очень точно обрисовали плюсы и минусы моего замысла".
"I commend your ability to face the facts without fear or prejudice, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."
languages.original_text: "Одобряю вашу способность взирать в лицо фактам без страха и предубеждений, Ваша Светлость. Вы очень точно обрисовали плюсы и минусы моего замысла".

traits.locale_text: "I commend your ability to face the facts without fear and prejudice, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You have very precisely described all the pros and cons of my plan."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "I commend your ability to face the facts without fear and prejudice, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You have very precisely described all the pros and cons of my plan."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "I commend your ability to face the facts without fear or prejudice, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. You have very accurately described all the pros and cons of my design."

traits.locale_text: "I commend your ability to face the facts without fear or prejudice, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "I commend your ability to face the facts without fear or prejudice, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

languages.text: « Je salue votre capacité à regarder les choses en face sans peur ni préjugés, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: "I commend your ability to face the facts without fear or prejudice, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: « Je salue votre capacité à regarder les choses en face sans peur ni préjugés, Votre Seigneurie. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «Admiro su capacidad de afrontar los hechos sin miedos ni prejuicios, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: "I commend your ability to face the facts without fear or prejudice, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: «Admiro su capacidad de afrontar los hechos sin miedos ni prejuicios, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “我赞赏你毫无畏惧与偏见面对事实的能力，大人。”
languages.original_text: "I commend your ability to face the facts without fear or prejudice, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: “我赞赏你毫无畏惧与偏见面对事实的能力，大人。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Ich beglückwünsche Euch zu Eurer Fähigkeit, die Fakten ohne Furcht oder Vorurteil zu akzeptieren, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: "I commend your ability to face the facts without fear or prejudice, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: "Ich beglückwünsche Euch zu Eurer Fähigkeit, die Fakten ohne Furcht und Vorurteil zu akzeptieren, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ihr habt sehr präzise alle Vor- und Nachteile meines Plans beschrieben."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「陛下、恐れや偏見を持たず、真実と向き合うその能力は称賛に値します」
languages.original_text: "I commend your ability to face the facts without fear or prejudice, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、恐れや偏見を持たず、真実と向き合うその能力は称賛に値します」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Gerçeklerle korkusuz ve ön yargısız bir şekilde yüzleşebilme yeteneğinizi takdir ediyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: "I commend your ability to face the facts without fear or prejudice, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."
